H0.text: The spinal trigeminal nucleus is located in the medulla.

H1.text: The spinal cord is where the spinal trigeminal nucleus is located.

H2.text: The spinal trigeminal nucleus is located in the pons.

H3.text: Cerebrum is the location of the spinal trigeminal nucleus.

A4.text: The spinal trigeminal nucleus is a nucleus in the medulla
